text: "The Wrestler" is a 2008 song by Bruce Springsteen and is the title track to the 2008 movie The Wrestler. It also is the third single from his 16th studio album Working on a Dream and went to number 93 in the United Kingdom, number 40 in Ireland, number 14 in Norway, number 63 in Canada, number 19 in Sweden and number 56 in the Netherlands. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 2010. == References == Category:2008 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: The Wrestler (song)
